name: Uncle Merton & Baby Virgle
description:
The year 1991
Aliens are here
Megacorporations reign
Religion is science
Magick is real
Virtual reality is a thing
Conspiracies are true
Life is good

--------------------------------------

You are Merton Jones, a regular office drone working at Blande & Blande Generic Consulting Services.

Do not worry: everything is under control and this will be a day just like any other. Every day will be alike, until death brings you sweet release. Please wash your hands, remain calm and do your job as usual.

Interacting with your soulcrushing corporate environment is easy enough: Left Click to advance/select options and Right Click to call out the game menu.
